title: Beautifully Together
description: Librarian Note: this is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00O6Z4LFU.Lives will be lost and forever changed in this epic conclusion.Taking a bullet was the least of my worries. My secret was out. I couldn't hide any longer. Finally, I could go home. Only the danger still lurked in the darkness. Watching. Waiting for the perfect time to strike. No one was safe. Especially with the amount of revenge my attacker sought. The happily ever after I so desperately wanted seemed bleak, and in the end, my future would depend on the man I fought to push away.
author: A.M. Guilliams
